title: [5.0.11rc1] can not sync to shared folder
body:
expected behavior
files sync with server

actual behavior
error message on client

steps to reproduce
--two users â€“ user1 shares a folder to user2 (test space directory)
    --user2 has full edit permissions:

![sync_1](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/5174383/1075941/0da41dfe-14d9-11e3-9e36-ede90d39485b.png)



 
--user2 is syncing his directory (including the shared folder) to his laptop 
--user2 places a file in the shared folder on the laptop (for example shared/test space )
--the client should sync that file to the server and then it should appear under  â€œtest spaceâ€? directory for both user1 and user2.  however, one of two errors appears in the client and the file is not synced:

![sync_error](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/5174383/1075944/13d6606a-14d9-11e3-9a12-75446ed7dbaa.png)
![error2](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/5174383/1075946/1644ba36-14d9-11e3-9377-9fc837c4c464.png)
 



 


{"installed":"true","version":"5.0.15","versionstring":"5.0.11rc1"}
ubuntu/apache

client info:
windows 7 operating system
release 1.4.0rc1


two files were put in this directory:  â€œerror2.pngâ€? and â€œsync_error.pngâ€? see logs:
